WEATHER FORECAST FOR 24 SEPTEMBER 2023
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 24 September 2023
Several spells of showers will occur in Western, Sabaragamuwa and North-western
provinces and in Galle and Matara districts.

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Central, Uva, Eastern and North-
Central provinces during the evening or night.

G
eneral public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.

Heavy rain: 100 – 150, Very heavy rain: 150 or more.
